name: Solitaire by Brilliant Labs
description:
Discover Brilliant Labs Solitaire, an easy-to-use, truly enjoyable app, offering seamless gameplay, gorgeous graphics, and hours of addictive fun! Solitaire has been designed specifically for your iPhone and iPod Touch, to bring you the best card game experience ever!

Can you think of any better way to clear your head after a long day of work or school than by sitting down to play your favorite card game? Better yet, how great would it be to play said game on your phone through an easy-to-use app? Well, wish no longer! These are the exact things you’ll get when you download Solitaire by Brilliant Labs, a game packed with great features, including:

• Unlimited games
• Draw One card or Draw Three cards modes
• Autocomplete to quickly finish the game (once you solved it)
• Right and left handed layouts
• Stunning graphics
 • Easy to read cards
• Show or hide timer option
 • Automatic game save and resume
 • Drag and drop to move cards
 • Double tap to quickly send cards to foundation
 • Standard scoring system and rules
• Best score, best times and number of games won
 • Game Center leaderboard. Prove to the world how good you are!

If you have already played Solitaire on your computer, you are going to love it on your iPhone and iPod.

Happy games!
